law.catch_line: Use of proof of and performance of duties of predecessor.
law.text: The master commissioner or receiver may use any proof reduced to writing and signed by his predecessor, and may execute any order or judgment which it was the duty of his predecessor to have executed, and which remains unexecuted.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 53, effective January 2, 1978.
